content.title: Build the App
content.body:
1. From the main menu, go to Build and select Live Preview Settings.
  2. In the Live Preview Settings window, under Native, select checkboxes next to OS of the mobile device on which you are going to view the app.
    For example: iOS and Android
    Ensure that you have unselected the checkboxes for all other platforms and channels.
  3. Click Save & Run.
    It may take some time for the Iris to show the Live Preview is ready window.
